thread.title: MEDIA ALERT: Leaders from Microsoft, Slack, Zenefits and More Head Up AppDirect Cloud Service Commerce Conference
thread.title_full: MEDIA ALERT: Leaders from Microsoft, Slack, Zenefits and More Head Up AppDirect Cloud Service Commerce Conference

author: admin
title: MEDIA ALERT: Leaders from Microsoft, Slack, Zenefits and More Head Up AppDirect Cloud Service Commerce Conference
text:
Who should attend : Business and technology leaders from SaaS companies and service providers. 
Why attend : Learn go-to-market and monetization strategies from cloud services developers and distributors 
Attendees can register and find more information about AppDirect’s Partner Summit here: http://partnersummit.appdirect.com/ 
About AppDirect : 
AppDirect is the cloud service commerce leader making software and products accessible globally. The AppDirect cloud service commerce platform unites providers, developers and consumers of cloud services into a single ecosystem. This makes it easy for businesses to find, buy, manage and monitor cloud services from a central location and delivers new opportunities to distribute, sell, and market cloud services. AppDirect-powered marketplaces, billing and distribution, and reselling services help providers – including Telstra, ADP, Samsung, Deutsche Telekom and others – connect millions of businesses to solutions from Microsoft, Google, Box and more. AppDirect is headquartered in San Francisco with global offices. Learn more at www.appdirect.com . 
About Traction: 
Traction Conf is a movement that brings founders, c-suite and experts from leading tech companies to teach startups how to get, keep and grow customers and users at scale. Traction Conf is founded and run by Launch Academy, a startup hub and pre-accelerator, and R&D Tax Advisory Firm, Boast Capital. Learn more at http://www.tractionconf.io .
